column3: For the year ended December 31, 2009, 2008 and 2007, the Company recorded other-than-temporary impairment losses of $32.0 million, $10.9 million, and zero, respectively. Additional unrealized losses of $181.3 million and zero, respectively, on these securities was recognized in other comprehensive income as a component of stockholders' equity at December 31, 2009 and 2008.
